title: Chris Martenson Crash Course DVD - NTSC - ISO File
description:
*** To download artwork and read more about distributing the DVD, visit   ***
*** this page: http://www.chrismartenson.com/distribute-crash-course-dvds ***


The version 1 release of Chris Martenson's Crash Course on DVD.  The Crash Course is a 19-chapter video detailing the links between the economy, the environment, and our energy needs on a global level.  Dr. Martenson shows how these connections are going to have a dramatic impact on the future.  As Chris states, "the next 20 years are going to be completely unlike the last 20 years".  Watch his video and share with others so you can be prepared for the changes ahead.

This file is specifically for playback on NTSC televisions.  The NTSC television format is used in North America, western South America, Japan, Philippines, South Korea, etc.  If you are uncertain if you live in a country that uses the NTSC television format, please see the map here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NTSC

If you do not live in a NTSC-format country, such as Brazil, China, India, or most of Europe, you will want to download the PAL version of the Crash Course, available at this URL: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4552038  Please search for other Chris Martenson torrents to find the one compatible for you.  After downloading the torrent, the ISO file will need to be burned to a DVD before it is possible to watch on a television.

If you would like to contact us with questions, or you would like to learn more information, please visit our website, www.ChrisMartenson.com.
